name: Petite Planetoid Problem
description:
Collect the stars, leap from planet to planet. You can't die, but you can try to do it faster.

  • Art: pen + paper, GIMP (sorry I didn't get to animate the main character)
  • Sounds: bfxr.net
  • Engine: Game Maker Studio 1.4

Keyboard: WASD or arrow keys, space or right shift to jump

Gamepad: left stick + A to jump
